snippet.title: Platypus Reclayed - Building a New Ship
snippet.description:
🚀 Join Anthony Flack, creator of Platypus as he speeds through the creation of a new player ship!
👊 Pilot the F-27 "Platypus" in our upcoming remake - Platypus Reclayed.

Wishlist: https://steampowered.com/app/2912430
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ClaymaticGames

Yes. Platypus Reclayed will also be releasing on consoles!
